sources.title: Dumpling House
sources.content: One of K-town's hidden gems, Dumpling House is a mecca for dumplings and steamed buns steamed or pan-fried. Visit this unassuming spot hidden in a small strip mall and order potstickers, filled pancakes, shumai and fluffy buns by six or eight pieces, or opt for one of the spot's bowls of soup packed with handmade noodles.
